concept.title: Attributes
concept.shortdesc: This section provides information about the attributes that are available on an element.

conbody.p: Typically, the attributes are defined in a reuse topic and then conkeyrefed into the element reference topic.

The attributes are listed in alphabetical order, with attribute groups preceding any individual attributes. Then, any attribute exceptions are listed. Finally, any attributes that are defined directly in the element-reference topic.
